components/common/theme-object:
<script>
  Theme = {};

  Theme.version = '1.1.12';
  Theme.shopName = '{{settings.store_name}}';

  Theme.carousel = {
    delay: '{{carousel.swap_frequency}}'
  };

  Theme.localization = {
    cart: {
      outOfStock: '{{lang "cart.out_of_stock"}}',
      errorMessageGeneral: '{{lang "cart.error"}}',
      itemsInCart: '{{lang "header.view_cart"}}'
    },
    product: {
      addSuccess: '{{lang "product.success"}}',
      outOfStock: '{{lang "product.error_message_stock"}}',
      zeroQuantity: '{{lang "product.error_zero_quantity"}}',
      errorMessageGeneral: '{{lang "product.error_message_general"}}',
      cartLink: '{{lang "product.cart_link"}}',
      homeLink: '{{lang "product.home_link"}}',
      checkoutLink: '{{lang "product.checkout_link"}}',
      addToCart: '{{lang "product.add_to_cart"}}',
      preOrder: '{{lang "product.pre_order"}}',
      soldOut: '{{lang "product.sold_out"}}'
    },
    urls: {
      cart: '{{urls.cart}}',
      checkout: '{{urls.checkout.single_address}}'
    }
  }

  Theme.messages = {
    cart: {
      "remove_item": "{{lang 'cart.checkout.remove_confirm'}}"
    },
    contact_us_errors: {
      "email": "{{lang 'forms.contact_us.errors.email'}}",
      "message": "{{lang 'forms.contact_us.errors.message'}}"
    }
  }
</script>
layout/unavailable:
<!doctype html>
<!--[if IE 8]><html class="no-js ie8 lt-ie10 lt-ie9" lang="en"> <![endif]-->
<!--[if IE 9 ]><html class="no-js ie9 lt-ie10"> <![endif]-->
<!--[if (gt IE 9)|!(IE)]><!--> <html class="no-js"> <!--<![endif]-->
<head>
  <script>document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace(/\bno-js\b/,'js');</script>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, height=device-height, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

  {{{head.meta_tags}}}

  <title>{{head.title}}</title>

  {{{head.config}}}

  <link href="{{head.favicon}}" rel="shortcut icon">

  <style type="text/css">
    @font-face {
      font-family: "form-icons";
      src: url({{cdn "assets/fonts/form-icons.eot"}});
      src: url({{cdn "assets/fonts/form-icons.woff"}}) format("woff");
      font-weight: normal;
      font-style: normal;
    }
  </style>

  {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}

  {{getFontsCollection}}

  {{{head.scripts}}}
  {{{head.rsslinks}}}

  {{> components/common/theme-object}}
  {{> components/global-injects}}
  {{{snippet 'html_head'}}}
</head>
<body>
  {{#block "page"}}{{/block}}
</body>
</html>
